discover.instruction: Read about daily habits. Notice the highlighted words.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай о ежедневных привычках. Обрати внимание на выделенные слова.

content.text: My morning routine: I <highlight>always</highlight> wake up at 7 AM. I <highlight>usually</highlight> take a shower first. I <highlight>often</highlight> eat breakfast at home, but <highlight>sometimes</highlight> I skip it. I <highlight>rarely</highlight> drink coffee - I prefer tea. I <highlight>never</highlight> leave home without my phone! My bus is <highlight>usually</highlight> on time, but it's <highlight>occasionally</highlight> late. I'm <highlight>hardly ever</highlight> late for work.
content.question: Where do these words appear in the sentence? What do they tell us?
content.question_ru: Где эти слова появляются в предложении? Что они нам говорят?

points.example: I always eat breakfast. She is always happy.
always > usually > often > sometimes > rarely > never

points.rule: Sometimes, usually, often can start a sentence
points.rule_ru: Sometimes, usually, often могут начинать предложение
points.example: Sometimes I work from home. Usually I take the bus.
I hardly ever eat fast food. (= almost never)

comparison_table.example: I occasionally go to the gym.

notice.instruction: Find all adverbs of frequency. Note their position in the sentence.
notice.instruction_ru: Найди все наречия частотности. Отметь их позицию в предложении.

tasks.text: My sister has interesting habits. She always wakes up early, even on weekends. She usually exercises before breakfast. She is never late for anything! She often works from home. Sometimes she goes to a cafe to work. She rarely eats junk food. She hardly ever watches TV. She occasionally reads fiction, but she usually reads non-fiction. I'm always amazed by her discipline!

notice.reflection_question: Why 'She is never late' but 'She never eats fast food'?
notice.reflection_question_ru: Почему 'She is never late', но 'She never eats fast food'?

sentences.sentence: I ___ drink coffee in the morning. (always)

questions.explanation: Adverb before main verb (or at start)

sentences.incorrect: I go always to the gym.
sentences.correct: I always go to the gym.

produce.instruction: Write about your daily habits using adverbs of frequency.
produce.instruction_ru: Напиши о своих ежедневных привычках, используя наречия частотности.
produce.example: I always wake up at 7 AM. I usually take a shower in the morning. I often eat breakfast at home, but sometimes I eat at work. I rarely skip meals. I never drink alcohol. I am usually in a good mood. I occasionally feel stressed, but I always try to stay positive.

input_flood.description: Read 5 texts with many adverbs of frequency.

texts.title: Healthy Lifestyle
texts.content: I try to live healthily. I always eat breakfast. I usually have fruit and yogurt. I often go to the gym - about three times a week. I sometimes skip exercise when I'm tired. I rarely eat fast food. I never smoke. I am usually in bed by 11 PM. I occasionally stay up late on weekends.

texts.title: Work Habits
texts.content: I usually arrive at work at 9 AM. I'm never late. I always check my emails first. I often have meetings in the morning. I sometimes work through lunch. I rarely leave before 6 PM. I occasionally work overtime. I hardly ever work on weekends - only in emergencies.

texts.title: Family Traditions
texts.content: Our family has many traditions. We always have dinner together on Sundays. We usually visit my grandparents monthly. We often play board games. Sometimes we go on picnics. We rarely argue - we're a close family. We never forget each other's birthdays. We are usually happy when we're together.

texts.title: Travel Preferences
texts.content: When I travel, I usually stay in hotels. I sometimes try hostels. I always book in advance. I often travel alone. I rarely go on group tours. I never travel without insurance. I usually take many photos. I am never bored on trips - I always find interesting things to do.

texts.title: Learning English
texts.content: I study English every day. I always use this app. I usually practice for 30 minutes. I often listen to podcasts. Sometimes I watch movies in English. I rarely speak English at work. I never miss a lesson. I am usually motivated, but occasionally I feel lazy. I hardly ever give up!
